short_description.en: Site built home and manufactured homes may qualify for a fractional rebate on patio/sliding doors replacement, up to 100% of costs.

amount.maximum: 100% of installation cost or material cost for self-installation

other_restrictions:
Home must be heated by an electric heat source.
New Construction windows & doors do not qualify for the rebates.

short_description.en: Free replacement of electric dryers (10 years or older) when you meet income eligibility requirements

other_restrictions: Must qualify based on income per program website; existing dryer must be 10 yrs or older

errors.message: must be equal to one of the allowed values

short_description.en: Receive a free Smart Thermostat with free professional installation and you can start saving up to $100 on your energy bill each year

rebate_value: Free offer for the latest energy-efficient technology, including up to four smart thermostats, valued at $300 per thermostat.
other_restrictions:
-NV Energy residential customers must have always-on broadband Internet access and central A/C to be eligible.
-During the peak summer months, on days when the demand for electricity is at its highest, NV Energy will initiate FlexResponse. This is a signal sent to your thermostat to increase the setpoint temperature up to 4 degrees. By participating, you can earn bill credits that get applied to your bill at the end of the year

errors.message: must be equal to one of the allowed values

authority_name: Raft River Rural Electric Co-op, Inc.

short_description.en: Incentive to improve the insulation in your existing single family, multi-family, or manufactured home with primary electric heat.

other_restrictions: Building has to have primary electric heat. Primary electric heat types include electric zonal, electric forced air furnace, air source heat pump, ground/water source heat pump, and ductless heat pump.
bonus_description: No specification of rebate amount—varies for project

errors.message: must be equal to one of the allowed values

authority_name: Raft River Rural Electric Co-op, Inc.

short_description.en: Raft River Rural Electric offers an incentive for qualified heat pumps.

other_restrictions: Must contact office for information BEFORE starting the project-requires pre-installation approval from Raft River

errors.message: must be equal to one of the allowed values

short_description.en: Offered to Plumas-Sierra Rural Electric Co-op residential members for the purchase and installation of qualified new Replacement Windows.

equipment_standards_restrictions: Must be single-pane or double-pane with metal frames, and have U-Factor of 0.30 or lower and a Solar Heat Gain Coefficient (SHGC) of 0.25 or lower
other_restrictions: Must have central air conditioning, heat pump, or electric heat. This application should be submitted within six (6) months of the purchase or installation date.
bonus_description: Your final invoice/receipt, NFRC stickers, and pre and post-installation documentation are required to submit this application. Applied as credit for customer's account if less than $125.

short_description.en: Offered to Plumas-Sierra Rural Electric Co-op residential members for the purchase and installation of qualified new Insulation upgrades.

rebate_value:
Attic insulation: $0.35 per sq. ft. (R-0 to R-49 or higher)

Attic insulation: $0.25 per sq. ft. (R-19 or lower to R-49 or higher)

Wall insulation: $0.25 per sq. ft. (R-0 to R-13 or higher)

Floor insulation: $0.25 per sq. ft. (R-0 to R-19 or higher)
equipment_standards_restrictions:
Final R values:
R-19 (floor)
R-49 (attic)
R-13 (wall)
other_restrictions: Must have central air conditioning, heat pump, or electric heat. This application should be submitted within six (6) months of the purchase or installation date.
bonus_description: Your final invoice/receipt and pre and post-installation documentation are required to submit this application. Applied as credit for customer's account if less than $125.

short_description.en: Offered to Plumas-Sierra Rural Electric Co-op residential members for the purchase and installation of a new, qualifying Central Air Conditioner.

rebate_value:
$25 per ton - Minimum 16.0 SEER and 13 EER (equivalent to 15.3 SEER2 and 12.5 EER2)

$50 per ton - Minimum 17.0 SEER and 13.3 EER (equivalent to 16.2 SEER2 and 12.8 EER2)

$75 per ton - Minimum 18.0 SEER and 14 EER (equivalent to 17.2 SEER2 and 13.4 EER2)
equipment_standards_restrictions: At least 16.0 SEER and 13 EER; for maximum incentives, will need at least 18.0 SEER and 14 EER
other_restrictions: This application should be submitted within six (6) months of the purchase or installation date.
bonus_description: Your final invoice/receipt, project's AHRI Certificate, and  basic home heating and cooling information are required to submit this application. Applied as credit for customer's account if less than $125.

short_description.en: Offered to Plumas-Sierra Rural Electric Co-op residential members for the purchase and installation of a new qualifying Air Source Heat Pump.

rebate_value:
$100 per ton - Minimum 16.0 SEER and 9.0 HSPF (equivalent to 15.3 SEER2 and 7.7 HSPF2)

$250 per ton - Minimum 17.0 SEER and 10.0 HSPF (equivalent to 16.2 SEER2 and 8.5 HSPF2)

$350 per ton - Minimum 18.0 SEER and 11.0 HSPF (equivalent to 17.2 SEER2 and 9.4 HSPF2)
equipment_standards_restrictions: At least 16.0 SEER and 9.0 HSPF; for maximum incentives, at least 18.0 SEER and 11.0 HSPF
other_restrictions: Equipment must be new and certified by the Air Conditioning, Heating, and Refrigeration Institute (AHRI). This application should be submitted within six (6) months of the purchase or installation date. Must not be required by Title 24 codes and standards
bonus_description: Your final invoice/receipt, project's AHRI Certificate, and  basic home heating and cooling information are required to submit this application. Applied as credit for customer's account if less than $125.

short_description.en: Offered to Plumas-Sierra Rural Electric Co-op residential members for the purchase and installation of a new qualifying Air Source Heat Pump.

equipment_standards_restrictions: Minimum 16.0 SEER and 9.0 HSPF (equivalent to 15.3 SEER2 and 7.7 HSPF2)
other_restrictions: Equipment must be new and certified by the Air Conditioning, Heating, and Refrigeration Institute (AHRI). This application should be submitted within six (6) months of the purchase or installation date. Must not be required by Title 24 codes and standards
bonus_description: Your final invoice/receipt, project's AHRI Certificate, and  basic home heating and cooling information are required to submit this application. Applied as credit for customer's account if less than $125.

short_description.en: Up to $600 per ton rebate for the purchase and installation of a new ENERGY STAR® Certified Ground Source Heat Pump.

other_restrictions: Equipment must be new and certified by the Air Conditioning, Heating, and Refrigeration Institute (AHRI). This application should be submitted within six (6) months of the purchase or installation date. Must not be required by Title 24 codes and standards
bonus_description: Your final invoice/receipt and project's AHRI Certificate are required to submit this application.

short_description.en: The Weatherization Assistance Program implements home energy conservation measures at no cost for residents below 200% of the federal poverty line.

contractor_restrictions: Measures must be recommended by a WAP-certified energy auditer and measures implemented by a WAP-certified contractor.
income_restrictions: Individuals and families must be at or below 200% of the Federal Poverty Line (FPL)
other_restrictions: For eligible homeowners and renters, there is no direct cost to participate in the program.  Owners of eligible rental properties may be required to pay of 50% of any capital improvement measures that are installed.
